title: An Act relative to expanding the newborn screening panel

abstracts.abstract: By Mr. Keenan, a petition (accompanied by bill, Senate, No. 1552) of John F. Keenan for legislation to expand the newborn screening panel to include pyruvate dehydrogenase complex deficiency.  Public Health.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Public Health
Hearing scheduled for 07/14/2025 from 01:00 PM-05:00 PM in A-1
